tool_description: An API to get updates on match statistics for different sports in Tanzania.
name: Sports Live Updates
title: Sports Live Updates

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.description: This contains names of all teams in Tanzania.

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description: This contains names of all competitions in Tanzania.

api_list.name: Players
api_list.description: This contains the statistics of all players in all competitions

optional_parameters.name: player_team_id
optional_parameters.description: This parameter helps you filter the players' teams by the team_id

api_list.name: Match_Events
api_list.description: This contains the statistics of all events that are happening within the match that is goals, fouls, offsides e.t.c

required_parameters.name: select
required_parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter data specific to the match events of a single match.

api_list.name: Matches
api_list.description: This contains the statistics of all matches from all sports leagues in Tanzania.

required_parameters.name: select
required_parameters.description: This allows you to select the columns that you need from the table

optional_parameters.name: match_competition_id
optional_parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter the matches by competition ids. The competitions and their ids are as follows; ** Premier League=1**,** Championship League=2, First League=3, FA Cup=4,Community Shield=5**. You can use eq, gt, lt and not conditional filters i.e eq.3

optional_parameters.name: match_date
optional_parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter data specific to the column that was selected as the parameter. You can use eq, gt, lt and not conditional filters i.e eq.20-01-2020
